title: You know skillshots have gone a bit too far when:
body: You have your support flame you because you don't dodge Taric's stuns.

replies.body:
SLOWEST SKILLSHOT IN THE GAME

Bro how do you not dodge it

Isn't Nunu's the slowest skill shot in the game? O.o

(great, now I'm actually curious about this)

Anivia's Q is the slowest I thought?

Nitpick: Nunu's isn't skillshot. The word you're looking for is projectile.
That's the joke. Taric's stun isn't a skill shot; neither is Nunu's which is hilariously slow as well. ._.

Well, I knew his was a joke, but yours seemed serious.

Oh well, no big deal.
Don't worry about it! :3
You've gotta admit though, that's pretty funny lol.

I actually find it to be the other way around with Taric. I seductively wink at the enemy Graves, hoping it'll be stunning enough to leave him stupefied where he stands, yet, by the time the fabulous realization of my beauty hits him, he's already dashed all the way to his tower, so it's pointless.
This is a perfect description of why travel time screws over the outrageous Taric.
{{champion:26}} NOT FABULOUS ENOUGH!!!
This thread baffles me as it implies there is something other than skillshots in the game.  If such a travesty were true, I bet it won't be the case for long!

I could list out over 50 targeted shots from memory.

Alas, I don't have the time.
Shame you don't have the time, because that also means you don't have the time to calculate just how far that flew over your head.
Alas, the path of trajection was unclear.

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ATIEnm4w,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-23T19:44:58.617+0000)
>
> I could list out over 50 targeted shots from memory.
> 
> Alas, I don't have the time.

I DO!!
{{champion:84}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:41}}{{champion:40}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:112}} 

i didn't count enhanced autoattacks or abilities that don't require you to click on a target (like sona's Q)
god tell me i didn't miss any

Lulu's Polymorph
Orianna's E sort of counts.
Lulu has 2 point and clicks actually.
Polymorph is a projectile and can be blocked by Yasuo's wall. Sure it's a fast one, but still a projectile. E is a point-and-click.
I believe it
I'm not even kidding. This is an actual incident.

I was playing an ARAM the other day and someone was like "wtf Fiddle, why didn't you dodge Veigar's ult?" and I had to explain how point and click abilities work and how I didn't have Zhonya's up either.
*sigh* R.I.P {{champion:45}} Q

> [{quoted}](name=Fed by Snu Snu,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ATIEnm4w,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-23T07:19:33.830+0000)
>
> You have your support flame you because you don't dodge Taric's stuns.

Well...you might not be able to dodge it, but you sure as hell can outrun it for a fair while XD

I almost want to see if there's a way to find the longest run from a {{champion:44}}  stun. Maybe A enemy {{champion:53}} grab to an ally {{champion:412}}  hook to an enemy {{champion:64}} Ult to a {{champion:254}}  Ult to a {{summoner:4}} + Q combo?
You act like they weren't that ill-informed before.
I think only Sivir can effectively neutralize Taric's dazzling smile. But even then, she has to see it to shield it.
You're forgetting that {{champion:56}} has it too. {{champion:157}} has that wind wall. There's also those champions that can remove cc off of themselves, such as {{champion:41}}.
That just means your support is Bronze lol

Silver to be precise. Was a EUNE smurf.

But even if it wasn't, I wouldn't blame the guy. It's not like he would have got to see Taric anytime the past one and a half year.
He's been out of the loop for far too long.

Why U no dodge taric's stun bronzie!

ragerageragerage


(j/k)
time to play smartcast udyr
Gems are truly outrageous!

You know skillshots have gone a bit too far when...

... you use Ezreal's W. Visual indicator's very clearly wrong, 100% reproducible.

(not the only one btw - despite what Riot says, many of the visual/range indicators are just wrong)

I got flamed once for not healing as Karma.

RIP Old Karma. :(
Its the other way around.
Someone has been playing too much Smite.
lol

lel just dodge the cumshot bro
lel
